title: Germany at the 2020 Winter Youth Olympics
text:
<a href="Germany">Germany</a> competed at the <a href="2020%20Winter%20Youth%20Olympics">2020 Winter Youth Olympics</a> in <a href="Lausanne">Lausanne</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a> from 9 to 22 January 2020. Germany competed with 90 athletes across 16 sports.
Medalists.
Medals awarded to participants of mixed-NOC teams are represented in italics. These medals are not counted towards the individual NOC medal tally.
Curling.
Germany qualified a mixed team of four athletes.
Short track speed skating.
Two German skaters achieved quota places for Germany based on the results of the <a href="2019%20World%20Junior%20Short%20Track%20Speed%20Skating%20Championships">2019 World Junior Short Track Speed Skating Championships</a>.
